titlepage.titleproper: Inventory of the Student Papers About Middletown Collection, 1972 - 2012
titlepage.publisher:
Special Collections & Archives
Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Student Papers About Middletown Collection, 1972 - 2012
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: Since 1972, student papers written on historical Middletown-area topics have been donated to Special Collections & Archives.

The Student Papers About Middletown Collection featuers graduate and undergraduate papers about the history of Middletown, Connecticut and the surrounding area. Topics include politics, labor, commerce, ethnic and racial groups, women's history, and leisure.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Student Papers About Middletown Collection, Collection #1000-133, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Finding aid revised by Leith Johnson, November 2012, October 2014

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Wesleyan University has offered a number of courses which discuss Middletown, Connecticut and its history. Since 1972, student papers written on historical Middletown-area topics have been donated to Special Collections & Archives.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Student Papers About Middletown Collection featuers graduate and undergraduate papers about the history of Middletown, Connecticut and the surrounding area. Topics include politics, labor, commerce, ethnic and racial groups, women's history, and leisure.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: The papers are arranged in alphabetical order by author's last name.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
